archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.4.4c: c) direct feeds from security event management activities, such as those produced by security event logging software or a security information and event management (SIEM) system
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
